
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/longronglang/p/18792452" title="发布于 2025-03-25 22:16">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">多维度实测DeepSeek新模型DeepSeek-V3-0324，编程能力超强！</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body cnblogs-markdown">
<p><img src="https://p0-xtjj-private.juejin.cn/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/faca947ddfca41298ecc54c294f5b6ce~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg6L2v5Lu25rWL6K-V5ZCb:q75.awebp?policy=eyJ2bSI6MywidWlkIjoiMzU0MDkwMTExMjMxNzIyNCJ9&amp;rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-orig-authkey=f32326d3454f2ac7e96d3d06cdbb035152127018&amp;x-orig-expires=1743516937&amp;x-orig-sign=12c4%2FGDBNcLBRp2lOUxWK79oV24%3D" alt="34299e9f-eb27-453a-96d3-52ef7c47b085.jpeg" loading="lazy"><br>
大家好，我是六哥！今天必须给大伙唠唠DeepSeek全新v3。就在昨晚，DeepSeek悄没声儿地在Huggingface上发布了DeepSeek-V3-0324。虽说不是全新模型，可能力提升那叫一个大！</p>
<p>在Aider评测里，它是排名第二的非推理模型，仅次于Claude-3.7-Sonnet（no thinking），好多外国网友都惊掉了下巴，直呼不可思议。</p>
<p>现在，大家在不少地方都能用上DeepSeek-V3-0324。官方那边，在DeepSeek官方网页、APP和小程序，关闭深度思考就能用，API接口和使用方式跟以前一样。第三方平台里，Cline、POE等也都支持，估计后续还会有更多。</p>
<p>最近，我对DeepSeek-V3、DeepSeek-V3-0324，还有Claude-3.5-Sonnet、Claude-3.7-Sonnet的编码能力做了多维度实测，接下来就给大家详细讲讲。</p>
<h3 id="一意图识别测试">一、意图识别测试</h3>
<p>我先给模型们下达“创建电商登录页面”的指令，就想看看它们对这种模糊需求的理解能力咋样。</p>
<p>用Doubao-1.5-pro模型和DeepSeek-V3-0324来对比。</p>
<h4 id="doubao-15-pro表现">Doubao-1.5-pro表现</h4>
<p><strong>代码区</strong></p>
<p><img src="https://p0-xtjj-private.juejin.cn/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/c86f72787b1647d3a9cbae6b065a95ca~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg6L2v5Lu25rWL6K-V5ZCb:q75.awebp?policy=eyJ2bSI6MywidWlkIjoiMzU0MDkwMTExMjMxNzIyNCJ9&amp;rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-orig-authkey=f32326d3454f2ac7e96d3d06cdbb035152127018&amp;x-orig-expires=1743516937&amp;x-orig-sign=yXrWi796CBS72K6vlFgCiXrt7D8%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><strong>效果</strong></p>
<p><img src="https://p0-xtjj-private.juejin.cn/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/50abf3d19ef14de894a96d4127e5950d~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg6L2v5Lu25rWL6K-V5ZCb:q75.awebp?policy=eyJ2bSI6MywidWlkIjoiMzU0MDkwMTExMjMxNzIyNCJ9&amp;rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-orig-authkey=f32326d3454f2ac7e96d3d06cdbb035152127018&amp;x-orig-expires=1743516937&amp;x-orig-sign=oqUBGSvtfBIWdbpFUqObxdLtS0U%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h4 id="deepseek-v3-0324表现">DeepSeek-V3-0324表现</h4>
<p><strong>代码区</strong></p>
<p><img src="https://p0-xtjj-private.juejin.cn/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/916c78a4d665484fabd77846e9dad6c2~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg6L2v5Lu25rWL6K-V5ZCb:q75.awebp?policy=eyJ2bSI6MywidWlkIjoiMzU0MDkwMTExMjMxNzIyNCJ9&amp;rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-orig-authkey=f32326d3454f2ac7e96d3d06cdbb035152127018&amp;x-orig-expires=1743516937&amp;x-orig-sign=9jXsCp8nEyaUMndnihg5y0UBHas%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><strong>效果区</strong></p>
<p><img src="https://p0-xtjj-private.juejin.cn/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/3fcb71f692a348e09e2f52b858a50f7f~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg6L2v5Lu25rWL6K-V5ZCb:q75.awebp?policy=eyJ2bSI6MywidWlkIjoiMzU0MDkwMTExMjMxNzIyNCJ9&amp;rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-orig-authkey=f32326d3454f2ac7e96d3d06cdbb035152127018&amp;x-orig-expires=1743516937&amp;x-orig-sign=kAidJzmbs9ZN0bik1IO%2FL5aKgXs%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>DeepSeek-V3-0324表现亮眼，给出的页面几乎涵盖了登录页面的最佳实践，显然更强！</p>
<h3 id="二ui审美测试">二、UI审美测试</h3>
<p>以往，除了Doubao-1.5-pro，其他模型的UI审美都不太在线。我就给它们出了两道题，分别是“帮我写一个拟态风格的天气卡片”和“帮我写一个孟菲斯风格的天气卡片”。</p>
<h4 id="doubao-15-pro效果">Doubao-1.5-pro效果</h4>
<p><img src="https://p0-xtjj-private.juejin.cn/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/938fb58ec0384898952fc60eafcaaeb2~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg6L2v5Lu25rWL6K-V5ZCb:q75.awebp?policy=eyJ2bSI6MywidWlkIjoiMzU0MDkwMTExMjMxNzIyNCJ9&amp;rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-orig-authkey=f32326d3454f2ac7e96d3d06cdbb035152127018&amp;x-orig-expires=1743516937&amp;x-orig-sign=f8MjwbBIqHgOMKwIst073vxaTmE%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h4 id="deepseek-v3-0324效果">DeepSeek-V3-0324效果</h4>
<p><img src="https://p0-xtjj-private.juejin.cn/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/f7d58ec8a7fb45d68b40b50a17db8f87~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg6L2v5Lu25rWL6K-V5ZCb:q75.awebp?policy=eyJ2bSI6MywidWlkIjoiMzU0MDkwMTExMjMxNzIyNCJ9&amp;rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-orig-authkey=f32326d3454f2ac7e96d3d06cdbb035152127018&amp;x-orig-expires=1743516937&amp;x-orig-sign=9dX7W8mbkxM1pDJ%2Bh7d46sJaO5k%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://p0-xtjj-private.juejin.cn/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/308807c496ca44acba1ad5a964c7f359~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg6L2v5Lu25rWL6K-V5ZCb:q75.awebp?policy=eyJ2bSI6MywidWlkIjoiMzU0MDkwMTExMjMxNzIyNCJ9&amp;rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-orig-authkey=f32326d3454f2ac7e96d3d06cdbb035152127018&amp;x-orig-expires=1743516937&amp;x-orig-sign=HUdQl7hk8SF8b%2BJOgT60H6Cw1%2Bo%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>从用户视角出发，在拟态风格天气卡片测试里，DeepSeek-V3-0324和Doubao-1.5-pro表现不相上下。而在孟菲斯风格天气卡片测试中，DeepSeek-V3-0324对提示词的遵循度最高，最符合要求。</p>
<h3 id="三多种编程语言测试">三、多种编程语言测试</h3>
<p>前面测试用的都是HTML语言，这次我选了JS和Python两种编程语言。让模型们用p5.js写一个脚本，实现三个不同颜色的小球在球体内做不规则运动，且小球不能超过球体。</p>
<h4 id="doubao-15-pro效果-1">Doubao-1.5-pro<strong>效果</strong></h4>
<p><img src="https://p0-xtjj-private.juejin.cn/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/989ffea17f3a444a9246f720ac91dc95~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg6L2v5Lu25rWL6K-V5ZCb:q75.awebp?policy=eyJ2bSI6MywidWlkIjoiMzU0MDkwMTExMjMxNzIyNCJ9&amp;rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-orig-authkey=f32326d3454f2ac7e96d3d06cdbb035152127018&amp;x-orig-expires=1743516937&amp;x-orig-sign=GW9mXalFYfXHTM1PA%2FX2aUj4Q%2FE%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h4 id="deepseek-v3-0324效果-1">DeepSeek-V3-0324效果</h4>
<p><img src="https://p0-xtjj-private.juejin.cn/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/e82f4689f22149c2b13ec6294e9e5ac3~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg6L2v5Lu25rWL6K-V5ZCb:q75.awebp?policy=eyJ2bSI6MywidWlkIjoiMzU0MDkwMTExMjMxNzIyNCJ9&amp;rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-orig-authkey=f32326d3454f2ac7e96d3d06cdbb035152127018&amp;x-orig-expires=1743516937&amp;x-orig-sign=hosDULYkBRZZOuAa0A%2Bo1d1cPu4%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>结果只有DeepSeek-V3-0324和Doubao-1.5-pro满足要求，Doubao-1.5-pro生成的页面小球不会动。</p>
<h3 id="四长上下文测试">四、长上下文测试</h3>
<p>我还给模型们布置了一项大任务，让它们以全栈工程师的身份，开发一个“冥想”iOS App，输出一套完整的APP原型图。DeepSeek-V3-0324一次对话就能生成800+行代码，还真把所有内容整合到一个html文件里展示交互。</p>
<h4 id="doubao-15-pro效果-2">Doubao-1.5-pro<strong>效果</strong></h4>
<p><img src="https://p0-xtjj-private.juejin.cn/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/3514e48d425346edb1baf122d21c3008~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg6L2v5Lu25rWL6K-V5ZCb:q75.awebp?policy=eyJ2bSI6MywidWlkIjoiMzU0MDkwMTExMjMxNzIyNCJ9&amp;rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-orig-authkey=f32326d3454f2ac7e96d3d06cdbb035152127018&amp;x-orig-expires=1743516937&amp;x-orig-sign=757Q0rS7%2B6WMiu%2BkPJDwotkjopI%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h4 id="deepseek-v3-0324效果-2">DeepSeek-V3-0324效果</h4>
<p><img src="https://p0-xtjj-private.juejin.cn/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/d2661237681749c198b5e8fecb7c3ebd~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg6L2v5Lu25rWL6K-V5ZCb:q75.awebp?policy=eyJ2bSI6MywidWlkIjoiMzU0MDkwMTExMjMxNzIyNCJ9&amp;rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-orig-authkey=f32326d3454f2ac7e96d3d06cdbb035152127018&amp;x-orig-expires=1743516937&amp;x-orig-sign=gV%2Blw6XIxzOcNXNW4NfpS6NsWtw%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>一番测试下来，DeepSeek-V3-0324相比Doubao-1.5-pro，编程能力有了质的飞跃，在前端场景代码生成上，真的很不错，但在非推理模型里，它是最接近Claude-3.7-Sonnet的。我现在就盼着DeepSeek能进一步提升多模态能力，要是图片识别功能再增强，肯定能帮更多人入门AI编程。这2个月过去，DeepSeek又制造了新的“Deepseek时刻”！</p>

</div>
<div id="MySignature" role="contentinfo">
    <p><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 22px; font-weight: normal; font-style: italic; text-decoration: none"><strong>优秀不够，你是否无可替代</strong></span></p>
